statements: SELECT * FROM speech_to_text_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT audio_file_path, transcription FROM speech_to_text_data WHERE language_code = 'EN';
SELECT id, transcription, transcription_date FROM speech_to_text_data WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM speech_to_text_data ORDER BY transcription_date DESC;
SELECT id, audio_file_path, language_code FROM speech_to_text_data WHERE language_code IN ('EN', 'FR') ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM speech_to_text_data WHERE language_code = 'en' ORDER BY transcription_date DESC;
SELECT id, audio_file_path FROM speech_to_text_data WHERE transcription LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT audio_file_path, language_code FROM speech_to_text_data WHERE transcription_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY language_code ASC;
SELECT id, transcription FROM speech_to_text_data WHERE transcription LIKE '%interesting%' AND language_code = 'fr' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_transcriptions FROM speech_to_text_data WHERE language_code = 'es';
SELECT * FROM SpeechData;
SELECT id, text_data FROM SpeechData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT audio_data FROM SpeechData WHERE text_data LIKE '%example%';
SELECT model_id, model_name FROM TranscriptionModels ORDER BY model_id DESC;
SELECT model_name, model_description FROM TranscriptionModels WHERE model_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, audio_data FROM SpeechData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT text_data, id FROM SpeechData WHERE text_data LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM SpeechData ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT model_id, model_name FROM TranscriptionModels WHERE model_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM SpeechData WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM speech_data WHERE speech_language = 'English';
SELECT speech_text FROM speech_data WHERE speech_id = 1;
SELECT speech_id, speech_language FROM speech_data ORDER BY speech_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM speech_data WHERE speech_language = 'Spanish' AND speech_id > 5;
SELECT speech_id, UPPER(speech_language) AS language FROM speech_data;
SELECT * FROM speech_data WHERE speech_language = 'English';
SELECT speech_text FROM speech_data WHERE speech_id = 1001;
SELECT speech_id, speech_text FROM speech_data WHERE speech_language = 'Spanish' ORDER BY speech_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM speech_data;
SELECT speech_id, speech_language FROM speech_data WHERE speech_language IN ('French', 'German') ORDER BY speech_language ASC;
SELECT * FROM speech_data;
SELECT transcribed_text, transcription_accuracy FROM speech_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT speaker_name, accent FROM speaker ORDER BY accent DESC;
SELECT model_name, model_accuracy FROM speech_recognition_model WHERE model_accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT model_name, model_accuracy FROM speech_recognition_model ORDER BY model_accuracy DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM speech_data;
SELECT speaker_name, accent FROM speaker;
SELECT model_name, model_accuracy FROM speech_recognition_model WHERE model_accuracy > 0.9;
SELECT speaker_name, transcribed_text FROM speaker INNER JOIN speech_data ON speaker.speaker_id = speech_data.id;
SELECT model_name, model_accuracy FROM speech_recognition_model ORDER BY model_accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM speaker_profile ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT audio_file_name, transcription FROM speech_audio_data WHERE speaker_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM transcription_history WHERE transcription_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT audio_id, label FROM model_training_data WHERE data_split = 'train';
SELECT model_version, recognition_accuracy FROM recognition_metrics ORDER BY recognition_accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM speech_audio_data WHERE speaker_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT audio_file_name, transcription FROM speech_audio_data WHERE transcription_confidence > 0.8;
SELECT DISTINCT speaker_id FROM speaker_profile WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT name, age, dialect FROM speaker_profile ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT audio_id, label FROM model_training_data WHERE data_split = 'test' ORDER BY training_id DESC;
